ovdesc.p: This application is an accounting compare utitlity. It is a live file and is updated when the service 'ACCOUNTING.COMPARE' is run.

desc.p: This is an amount field. The CAL/CPL ids from RE.STAT.LINE.CONT for the line-ccy combination are extracted and the balances from the CAL/CPL are taken and updated into this field. Upto 19 charaters are allowed.
The CAL/CPL ids from RE.STAT.LINE.CONT for the line-ccy combination are extracted and updated in this field. Mandatory Field. Upto 34 characters are allowed with a minimum of 3 characters

The job LINE.BAL.COMPARE will select the RE.STAT.LINE.BAL file. The record routine would read the imported file and the file from the current area and when the balances are not equal will write the line.ids into this field. Upto 19 characters are allowed.
